name: A Surviving Soldier
location: Veniccio, in cave to far left, behind boulder
memo: A warrior who died long ago in Veniccio roams around night after night.  What? You scared?

name: Air Cleaner
location: Luna Labs, outer Labs, in corner

name: Alexandra's Bed
location: Moon Flower Palace, Alexandria's Room

name: Ancient Mural
location: Ocean's Roar Cave, Cave of the Ancient Mural
memo: Grab a nice shot of the mural of the imaginary world of the "Moon of Destruction".

name: Auto Book Reader
location: Cedric's Shop, top floor, holding book with idea

name: Banana
location: Veniccio, inside Iron House (Georama element)

name: Bar Sign
location: Palm Brinks, outside Bar

name: Baron's Hangin' On
location: Underground Channel, when Vanguard is inverted for slam attack
memo: Get a shot of Baron Balloon being flipped over by a Vanguard during a Trample Attack!

name: Barrel
location: Common item

name: Basket Steamer
location: Balance Valley, on Chinese Stand

name: Bed
location: Common item

name: Belt
location: Palm Brinks, worn by Sheriff Blinkhorn

name: Bench
location: Palm Brinks, next to lake

name: Binoculars
location: Cedric's Shop, top floor, on stand on counter

name: Blackstone One
location: Train Station, any exterior shot

name: Blue Lantern
location: Moon Flower Palace, Flower Garden

name: Boat
location: Palm Brinks, on lake, by pier

name: Bomber Head Boom!
location: Mount Gundor, reduce a Bomber Head to near death, then take a picture when he explodes
memo: This one might be a little tough.  You need to get a shot of this thing when it comes after you and self-destructs.

name: Bone
location: Dell Clinic, the skeleton

name: Book
location: Common item

name: Bottle
location: Common item

name: Brave Little Linda
location: Underground Channel, with forelegs in air
memo: Watch for the moment Linda stomps down on you with her front foot.  It might be a little scary, but you can do it.

name: Bread
location: Polly's Bakery

name: Bridge
location: Palm Brinks, the stone bridges in front of Max's House

name: Burning Dragon Fire
location: Starlight Canyon, take picture as it's breathing fire
memo: The moment a dragon, with its piercing gaze, spits fire at you.

name: Cafe Sign
location: Palm Brinks, in front of Cafe

name: Camellia Tree
location: Moon Flower Palace, Georama element

name: Can
location: Polly's Bakery, on shelf

name: Candle
location: Palm Brinks Church

name: Car
location: Palm Brinks Bar, it's what the bartender is standing in

name: Cart
location: Palm Brinks, two large wheels with cargo area between them and two long handles

location: Palm Brinks, in front of Cedric's Shop

name: Chair
location: Common item

name: Chandelier
location: Common item

name: Changing Dog Statue
location: Starlight Canyon, as Dog Statue is changing from a block
memo: The moment that cute Dog Statue changes its shape, you click that shutter.

name: Charging Ram
location: Starlight Canyon, as Ram is charging
memo: They've got big bellies, but they also got the fastest legs you ever did see.  Just catch one of them on film, buddy.

name: Chimney
location: Palm Brinks, outside Parn's Studio

name: Chinese Lantern
location: Balance Valley, on Chinese Stand

name: Cinders
missableNote: Only before you destroy the Fire Squall
location: Heim Rada, build a straw hut and let it burned while embers fall

name: Clock
location: Common item

name: Cloth
location: Parn's Studio, on the floor

name: Clown Robo's Attack
location: Underground Channel, with eye open to shoot missile
memo: Catch that horrifying moment when the Clown Robo launches its missiles.  But watch out 'cause you won't have much time!

name: Coal
location: Blackstone One, locomotive

location: Gundorada Workshop, in the Operations Room

name: Constructor

location: Max's House, Max's room

name: Dangerous Pumpkin
location: Rainbow Butterfly Wood, when Pumpkinhead is twirling his weapon

name: Dead Tree
location: Griffon's Palace, the dead-looking trees

name: Display Robo
location: Gundorada Workshop, G-PARTS store on second level, on left

location: Shigura Village, take a picture of Jaming's flying machine
memo: Get a shot of Jaming in action, pulling the Shiguras' strings.

name: Drawbridge
location: Palm Brinks, it's the big bridge over the river

name: Drawer
location: Max's House, Max's room

name: Dresser
location: Max's House, Max's room

name: Drum Can
location: Gundorada Workshop, in G-PARTS store on the second level, on the left

location: Rainbow Butterfly Wood, altar on which the Earth Gem rests

name: Egg

name: Electric Sesame
location: Gundorada Workshop, in G-PARTS store on the second level, device that looks like a top to your right

name: Elena's Portrait
location: Max's House, Gerald's room, above bed

name: Elevator
location: Gundorada Workshop, on the left and right once restoration conditions are met

name: Energy Pipe
location: Luna Labs, glowing pipes in outer Labs

name: Evening Sun
location: Palm Brinks, lake area, take a picture of the sun as it sets

name: Eyeball
location: Dell Clinic, on the right, next to skeleton

name: Face Behind the Devil Mask
location: Starlight Canyon, take picture of Masked Tribesman's open mouth
memo: Those Masked Tribesmen fall flat on their backs.  Get in there and snap one of their silly faces behind their mask shields.

name: Faintin' Bone Lord
location: Mount Gundor, stun him with a rock at take a picture of his head
memo: When that Bone Lord goes unconscious, watch him, because his eyes go all googley.  Take the shot then.

name: Fallen Battleship
location: Mount Gundor Mouth, take a picture of the wreckage of the Death Ark
memo: Get a nice shot of the site where that Death Ark crashed!

name: Fan
location: Cedric's Shop, top floor, next to stairs

name: Fence
location: Palm Brinks, in front of Max's House

name: Figure
location: Parn's Studio, any statue

name: Find the Golden Egg!
location: Jurak Mall, on Jurak's Branch when Georama is 100%
memo: Go for a shot of that fantastic shiny golden egg at Jurak Mall in the future.

name: Fire Altar
location: Kazarov Stonehenge, pillar on the side of the main altar area with a red light
memo: This is NOT the same as the Fire Gem Altar!  See the Scoops section for the location of the Fire Gem Altar.

name: Fire Gem Altar
location: Mount Gundor, altar on which the Fire Gem rests

name: Fire House
location: Blackstone One, locomotive

name: Fire Squall
missableNote: Only before you blow it up :-)
location: Mount Gundor Summit, large machine spewing fire
memo: The fearsome device Fire Squall that rains fire on Heim Rada.  Go get a shot of that!

name: Fireplace
location: Max's House, Gerald's room

name: Fish
location: Max's House, kitchen, on table

location: Palm Brinks, outside Finny Frenzy

name: Fishing Contest Sign
location: Palm Brinks, outside Fishing Contest

name: Flag
location: Palm Brinks, outside Cedric's Shop, triangular

name: Floatin' Earth Digger
location: Rainbow Butterfly Wood, when Moler is jumping
memo: They're always moving around underground.  Catch one of them Molers up in the air a rare sight indeed.

name: Flotsam Revived!
location: Zelmite Mines, A Suspicious Opening, "Immortal Clown Metal Flotsam"

name: Flower
location: Max's House, maid's quarters, top floor on desk

name: Flower Bathed in Light
location: Moon Flower Palace Garden, flowers in pots

name: Flower Bed
location: Moon Flower Palace Georama; place a "Flower Bed"

name: Flower Chair
location: Train Station, looks like giant flower

name: Flower Chandelier
location: Moon Flower Palace, Sun Chamber, the blue lights on the ceiling

name: Flower of the Sun
location: Moon Flower Palace Garden, flower laying on the Sun Table
memo: Get a picture of a Sun Flower from the Flower Garden or Alexandra's room.

name: Flying Battleship
location: Starlight Canyon, during the fight to protect Lin -OR- Shigura Village, in the background of the battle with Jaming -OR- Mount Gundor Summit, while fighting the Death Ark
memo: Try pointin' your camera at Death Ark, the flying warship.

name: Fountain
location: Palm Brinks, in front of train station

name: Freight Train
location: Train Station, to the right of Blackstone One

location: Balance Valley, Church (Georama element), on wall

location: Sindain, on Fruit Tree (Georama element)

location: Luna Labs, main lab, glowing columns w/ pipes

location: Palm Brinks, outside Max's House

name: Geyser
location: Heim Rada, take a picture of a geyser in the town area

name: Giant Yorda Tree
location: Starlight Canyon, Yorda's Valley

location: Kazarov Stonehenge, once the Chrono Union has been executed

name: Glasses Case
location: Need's Office, on left wall

name: Glowing Gate
location: Fishing Contest, arch near entrance

name: Gold Gate
location: Take a picture of the gate before entering the courtyard of the Moon Flower Palace

name: Gold Store
location: Palm Brinks Weapon Shop, vault-like texture on wall to left of counter

name: Golden Door
location: Moon Flower Palace, Sun Chamber, the door to the Dream Spiral area

name: Grass
location: Sindain, Georama element

name: Griffon's Real Face
location: Moon Flower Palace, anytime during the battle with Griffon
memo: Emperor Griffon, master of darkness.  It'd certainly be a scoop to get one of him.

name: Gyumo's Yell
location: Rainbow Butterfly Wood, shoot him, then take picture when he yells
memo: Right when Gyumo's screaming.  Maybe, it's trying to intimidate everyone.  Get this moment on film.

name: Hammer
location: Gundorada Workshop, G-WEAPONS, behind counter

name: Hammock
location: Firbits' House, back wall

name: Hand-Sewn Silk Flag
location: Balance Valley, on Chinese Stand

name: Hat
location: Starlight Temple, in Weapon Shop

name: Hmmmm! Jurak
location: Jurak Mall, after reviving Jurak
memo: Grab a shot of Jurak, the resurrected Elder of the Forest Spirits.

name: Hoe
location: Morton's House, second floor, the large tools on the back wall

name: Holy Emblem
location: Balance Valley, inside Church

name: Hooked Nose
location: Moon Flower Palace, front of overhang over entrance

name: Horn
location: Starlight Temple, in Weapon Shop

name: Hot Springs Pond
location: Heim Rada, down the ramp to the far left of the entrance of the town (from the train stop)

name: Hot Springs Spirit
location: Heim Rada, floating over the hot spring to the right of the ramp
memo: I've heard Heim Rada is a bit of a spot for ghosts.  Don't worry. You won't be cursed.

name: Hurray For Rock Man!
location: Starlight Canyon, take a picture of a Golem as it prepares a ground slam attack (hands over head)
memo: An attack by a Golem.  Get it the second one raises up both arms. Temperamental buggers, aren't they?

name: Iron Bridge
location: Underground Channel, at exit (reservoir)

name: Iron Maiden
location: Palm Brinks Weapon Shop, bottom floor

name: Iron Shed
location: Veniccio, Georama element

name: Ixion
location: Moon Flower Palace, immediately after arriving
memo: The superexpress that flies through time and space!  Get a picture of Ixion!

location: Jurak Mall, in front of Jurak Arms

location: Sindain, Georama element

name: Jurak's Nose
location: Sindain, Georama element

name: Kazarov Stonehenge
location: Kazarov Stonehenge, take a picture of the central altars
memo: Check out the three altars in the center of Kazarov Stonehenge.

name: King Mardan
missableNote: Only until you give him the Priscleen
location: Rainbow Butterfly Wood, as soon as you regain control of the your character
memo: It's the peculiar giant fish from Fish Monster Swamp.  It may be a little gross, but I know you can handle it.

name: Labyrinth Door
location: Moon Flower Palace, Sun Chamber, the entrance to the level

name: Ladder
location: Common item

location: Common item

location: Balance Valley, Georama element

location: Mount Gundor Mouth, path created by using the Fire Horn

name: Legend of the Moon
location: Moon Flower Palace, Dream Spiral, while timer is counting down

location: Max's House, maid's quarters, second floor, on desk

location: Max's House, Gerald's Room, lamp above fireplace

location: Take a picture of the door of the Palace before confronting Griffon

name: Night Stalker
location: Underground Channel, during spinning attack
